name: setup-tailwind

schema.title: Configures Tailwind CSS for an application or a library.
schema.description: Adds the Tailwind CSS configuration files for a given Vue project and installs, if needed, the packages required for Tailwind CSS to work.

examples.description: Initialize Tailwind configuration for the `my-app` project.

project.description: The name of the project to add the Tailwind CSS setup for.
project.x-prompt: What project would you like to add the Tailwind CSS setup?

skipFormat.description: Skips formatting the workspace after the generator completes.

stylesheet.description: Path to the styles entry point relative to the workspace root. This option is only needed if the stylesheet location cannot be found automatically.

description: Set up Tailwind configuration for a project.
